enchantsData.name: Rune of Cinderglacier
enchantsData.description: Affixes your rune weapon with a rune that has a chance to increase the damage by 20% for your next 2 attacks that deal Frost or Shadow damage. Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Rune of Lichbane
enchantsData.description: Affixes your rune weapon with a rune that adds 2% extra weapon damage as Fire damage or 4% versus Undead targets. Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Rune of Razorice
enchantsData.description: Affixes your weapon with a rune that causes 2% extra weapon damage as Frost damage and increases enemies' vulnerability to your Frost attacks. Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Rune of Spellbreaking
enchantsData.description: Affixes your one-handed rune weapon with a rune that deflects 2% of all spell damage and reduces the duration of Silence effects by 50% (not cumulative with additional Silence duration reduction). Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Rune of Spellshattering
enchantsData.description: Affixes your two-handed rune weapon with a rune that deflects 4% of all spell damage and reduces the duration of Silence effects by 50%. Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Rune of Swordbreaking
enchantsData.description: Affixes your one-handed rune weapon with a rune that increases Parry chance by 2% and reduces the duration of Disarm effects by 50%. Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Rune of Swordshattering
enchantsData.description: Affixes your two-handed rune weapon with a rune that increases Parry chance by 4% and reduces the duration of Disarm effects by 50%. Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Rune of the Fallen Crusader
enchantsData.description: Affixes your rune weapon with a rune that has a chance to heal you for 3% and increase total Strength by 15% for 15 sec. Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Rune of the Nerubian Carapace
enchantsData.description: Affixes your rune weapon with a rune that increases Defense by 13 and total Stamina by 1%. Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Rune of the Stoneskin Gargoyle
enchantsData.description: Affixes your two-handed rune weapon with a rune that increases Defense by 25 and total Stamina by 2%. Modifying your rune weapon requires a Rune Forge in Ebon Hold.

enchantsData.name: Flexweave Underlay
enchantsData.description:
Permanently attaches a flexweave underlay to a cloak, increasing Agility by 23 and allowing you to turn the cloak into a parachute to fall slowly for 30 sec.
The cloak can only be used once a minute and requires an Engineering skill of at least 350.

enchantsData.name: Frag Belt
enchantsData.description: Attach a miniaturized explosive assembly to your belt, allowing you to detach and throw a Cobalt Frag Bomb every 6 minutes.

enchantsData.name: Hand-Mounted Pyro Rocket
enchantsData.description:
Permanently attaches a hand-mounted pyro rocket launcher to your gloves, allowing a skilled engineer to deal 1654 to 2020 Fire damage to an enemy at long range. The rocket can only be fired once every 45 sec.
Can only be used on the engineer's gloves, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound.

enchantsData.name: Hyperspeed Accelerators
enchantsData.description: Permanently attaches hyperspeed accelerators to a pair of gloves, allowing a skilled engineer to increase their haste rating by 340 for 12 sec. The gloves can only be activated every minute.

enchantsData.name: Mind Amplification Dish
enchantsData.description: Attaches a tiny mind amplification dish to your helmet, increasing Stamina by 45 and allowing you to engage in mental battle with your enemies to, hopefully, control them. Can be used every 10 min.

enchantsData.name: Nitro Boosts
enchantsData.description:
Permanently attaches overpowered nitro boosts to a pair of boots, increasing your critical strike rating by 24 and allowing you to greatly increase run speed for 5 sec.
The nitro boosts can only be activated every 3 minutes and require an Engineering skill of at least 400.

enchantsData.name: Reticulated Armor Webbing
enchantsData.description:
Permanently inserts reticulated armor webbing into gloves, increasing armor by 885.
Attaching the armor webbing causes the gloves to become soulbound. An Engineering skill of 400 is required to keep the webbing active.

enchantsData.name: Springy Arachnoweave
enchantsData.description:
Permanently attaches a springy arachnoweave to a cloak, increasing spell power by 27 and allowing you to turn the cloak into a parachute to fall slowly for 30 sec.
The cloak can only be used once a minute and requires an Engineering skill of at least 350.

enchantsData.name: Global Thermal Sapper Charge
enchantsData.use: Explodes when triggered, dealing 2188 to 2812 Fire damage to all enemies nearby and 2188 to 2812 damage to you. Also causes major siege damage. (5 minutes cooldown)

enchantsData.name: Darkglow Embroidery
enchantsData.description:
Embroiders a magical pattern into your cloak, giving you a chance to restore 400 mana when you cast a spell.
You can only embroider your own cloak and embroidering your cloak will cause it to become soulbound. Requires 400 Tailoring to use.

enchantsData.name: Lightweave Embroidery
enchantsData.description:
Embroiders a subtle pattern of light into your cloak, giving you a chance to increase your spell power by 295 for 15 sec when casting a spell.
Embroidering your cloak will cause it to become soulbound. Requires 400 Tailoring to use.

enchantsData.name: Socket Bracer
enchantsData.description:
Permanently add a socket to your bracers. Requires a level 60 or higher item.
Cannot add more than one socket to an item. Can only add a socket to your own armor, and adding a socket binds the item to you. The added socket requires that you maintain 400 blacksmithing or it will become inactive.

enchantsData.name: Socket Gloves
enchantsData.description:
Permanently add a socket to your gloves. Requires a level 60 or higher item.
Cannot add more than one socket to an item. Can only add a socket to your own armor, and adding a socket binds the item to you. The added socket requires that you maintain 400 blacksmithing or it will become inactive.

enchantsData.name: Fur Lining - Attack Power
enchantsData.description:
Permanently enchant bracers to increase attack power by 130.
Can only be used on the leatherworker's bracers, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound. Fur Lining requires at least 400 skill in Leatherworking to remain active.

enchantsData.name: Fur Lining - Spell Power
enchantsData.description:
Permanently enchant bracers to increase spell power by 76.
Can only be used on the leatherworker's bracers, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound. Fur Lining requires at least 400 skill in Leatherworking to remain active.

enchantsData.name: Fur Lining - Stamina
enchantsData.description:
Permanently enchant bracers to increase Stamina by 102.
Can only be used on the leatherworker's bracers, and doing so will cause them to become soulbound. Fur Lining requires at least 400 skill in Leatherworking to remain active.

enchantsData.name: Ring - Assault
enchantsData.description: Permanently enchant a ring to increase attack power by 40. Only the Enchanter's rings can be enchanted, and enchanting a ring will cause it to become soulbound.

enchantsData.name: Ring - Greater Spell Power
enchantsData.description: Permanently enchant a ring to increase spell power by 23. Only the Enchanter's rings can be enchanted, and enchanting a ring will cause it to become soulbound.

enchantsData.name: Ring - Stamina
enchantsData.description: Permanently enchant a ring to increase Stamina by 30. Only the Enchanter's rings can be enchanted, and enchanting a ring will cause it to become soulbound.

enchantsData.name: Master's Inscription of the Axe
enchantsData.description:
Permanently adds 120 attack power and 15 critical strike rating to shoulder armor.
Can only be applied to your own armor, and doing so will cause it to become soulbound.

enchantsData.name: Master's Inscription of the Crag
enchantsData.description:
Permanently adds 70 spell power and 8 mana every 5 sec to shoulder armor.
Can only be applied to your own armor, and doing so will cause it to become soulbound.

enchantsData.name: Master's Inscription of the Pinnacle
enchantsData.description:
Permanently adds 60 dodge rating and 15 defense rating to shoulder armor.
Can only be applied to your own armor, and doing so will cause it to become soulbound.

enchantsData.name: Master's Inscription of the Storm
enchantsData.description:
Permanently adds 70 spell power and 15 critical strike rating to shoulder armor.
Can only be applied to your own armor, and doing so will cause it to become soulbound.

enchantsData.name: Mixology
enchantsData.description: You receive an increased effect and duration when you drink any elixir or flask you are able to make. You will gain an additonal +37 Spell Power, +64 Attack Power, +13 Mana per 5, or 320 Health based on the flask you consume.

enchantsData.name: Master of Anatomy
enchantsData.description: Skinning all those dead animals has broadened your anatomical knowledge, increasing your critical strike rating by 40.

enchantsData.name: Swordguard Embroidery
enchantsData.description:
Embroiders a magical pattern into your cloak, causing your damaging melee and ranged attacks to sometimes increase your attack power by 400 for 15 sec.
You can only embroider your own cloak and embroidering your cloak will cause it to become soulbound. Requires 400 Tailoring to use.

enchantsData.name: Toughness
enchantsData.description: All your hard work spent mining has made you exceptionally tough, increasing your Stamina by 60.

abilitiesData.name: Faerie Fire
abilitiesData.description: Decrease the armor of the target by 5% for 5 min. While affected, the target cannot stealth or turn invisible.

abilitiesData.name: Wrath
abilitiesData.description: Causes 553 to 623 Nature damage to the target.

abilitiesData.name: Starfall
abilitiesData.description: You summon a flurry of stars from the sky on all targets within 30 yards of the caster, each dealing 563 to 653 Arcane damage. Also causes 101 Arcane damage to all other enemies within 5 yards of the enemy target. Maximum 20 stars. Lasts 10 sec. Shapeshifting into an animal form or mounting cancels the effect. Any effect which causes you to lose control of your character will suppress the starfall effect.

abilitiesData.name: Moonfire

abilitiesData.name: Lunar Eclipse

When you critically hit with Wrath, you have a 60% chance of increasing your critical strike chance with Starfire by 40%. Each effect lasts 15 sec and each has a separate 30 sec cooldown. Both effects cannot occur simultaneously.

abilitiesData.name: Solar Eclipse-boomy
abilitiesData.description: When you critically hit with Starfire, you have a 100% chance of increasing damage done by Wrath by 40%. When you critically hit with Wrath, you have a 60% chance of increasing your critical strike chance with Starfire by 40%. Each effect lasts 15 sec and each has a separate 30 sec cooldown. Both effects cannot occur simultaneously.

abilitiesData.name: Solar Eclipse
abilitiesData.description: When you critically hit with Starfire, you have a 100% chance of increasing damage done by Wrath by 40%. When you critically hit with Wrath, you have a 60% chance of increasing your critical strike chance with Starfire by 40%. Each effect lasts 15 sec and each has a separate 30 sec cooldown. Both effects cannot occur simultaneously.

abilitiesData.name: Eclipse
abilitiesData.description: When you critically hit with Starfire, you have a 100% chance of increasing damage done by Wrath by 40%. When you critically hit with Wrath, you have a 60% chance of increasing your critical strike chance with Starfire by 40%. Each effect lasts 15 sec and each has a separate 30 sec cooldown. Both effects cannot occur simultaneously.

abilitiesData.name: Starfire
abilitiesData.description: Causes 1028 to 1212 Arcane damage to the target.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Insect Swarm

abilitiesData.name: Hurricane

abilitiesData.name: Moonkin Form
abilitiesData.description: Shapeshift into Moonkin Form. While in this form the armor contribution from items is increased by 370%, damage taken while stunned is reduced by 15%, and all party and raid members within 100 yards have their spell critical chance increased by 5%. Single target spell critical strikes in this form have a chance to instantly regenerate 2% of your total mana. The Moonkin can not cast healing or resurrection spells while shapeshifted.
extra: The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Moonkin Form

abilitiesData.name: Improved Faerie Fire

abilitiesData.name: Leader of the Pack

abilitiesData.name: Demoralizing Roar

abilitiesData.name: Mangle (Bear)

abilitiesData.name: Innervate

abilitiesData.name: Rebirth

abilitiesData.name: Infected Wounds

abilitiesData.name: Survival of the Fittest

abilitiesData.name: Savage Defense

abilitiesData.name: Furor

abilitiesData.name: Faerie Fire (Feral)

abilitiesData.description: Decrease the armor of the target by 5% for 5 min. While affected, the target cannot stealth or turn invisible. Deals (Attack power * 0.15 + 1) damage and additional threat when used in Bear Form or Dire Bear Form.

abilitiesData.name: Lacerate
abilitiesData.description: Lacerates the enemy target, dealing 88 damage and making them bleed for 320 damage over 15 sec and causing a high amount of threat. Damage increased by attack power. This effect stacks up to 5 times on the same target.

abilitiesData.name: Berserk

abilitiesData.name: Maul

abilitiesData.name: Swipe (Bear)

abilitiesData.name: Barkskin

abilitiesData.name: Survival Instincts

abilitiesData.name: Frenzied Regeneration

abilitiesData.name: Revitalize

abilitiesData.name: Rejuvenation

abilitiesData.name: Wild Growth

abilitiesData.name: Tree of Life

abilitiesData.name: Lifebloom

abilitiesData.name: Regrowth

abilitiesData.name: Nourish

abilitiesData.name: Swiftmend

abilitiesData.name: Healing Touch

abilitiesData.name: Nature's Swiftness

abilitiesData.name: Tranquility

abilitiesData.name: Gift of the Earthmother
abilitiesData.description: Increases your total spell haste by 10% and reduces the base cooldown of your Lifebloom spell by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Celestial Focus
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting Starfire, Hibernate and Hurricane by 70% and increases your total spell haste by 3%.

abilitiesData.name: Wrath of Air Totem

abilitiesData.name: Swift Retribution

abilitiesData.name: Empowered Touch

abilitiesData.name: Bloodlust

abilitiesData.name: Heroism
abilitiesData.description: Increases melee, ranged, and spell casting speed by 30% for all party and raid members. Lasts 40 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Typhoon

abilitiesData.description: Increases damage of all spells against targets with less than 35% health by 12%.

abilitiesData.name: Combustion
abilitiesData.description: When activated, this spell increases your critical strike damage bonus with Fire damage spells by 50%, and causes each of your Fire damage spell hits to increase your critical strike chance with Fire damage spells by 10%. This effect lasts until you have caused 3 non-periodic critical strikes with Fire spells.

abilitiesData.name: Molten Armor
abilitiesData.description: Causes 170 Fire damage when hit, increases your critical strike rating by 35% of your Spirit, and reduces the chance you are critically hit by 5%. Only one type of Armor spell can be active on the Mage at any time. Lasts 30 min.

abilitiesData.name: Living Bomb
abilitiesData.description: The target becomes a Living Bomb, taking 1380 Fire damage over 12 sec. After 12 sec or when the spell is dispelled, the target explodes dealing 690 Fire damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Pyroblast
abilitiesData.description: Hurls an immense fiery boulder that causes 1190 to 1510 Fire damage and an additional 452 Fire damage over 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Hot Streak
abilitiesData.description: Any time you score 2 non-periodic spell criticals in a row using Fireball, Fire Blast, Scorch, Living Bomb, or Frostfire Bolt, you have a 100% chance the next Pyroblast spell cast within 10 sec will be instant cast.

abilitiesData.name: Fireball
abilitiesData.description: Hurls a fiery ball that causes 888 to 1132 Fire damage and an additional 116 Fire damage over 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Frostfire Bolt
abilitiesData.description: Launches a bolt of frostfire at the enemy, causing 722 to 838 Frostfire damage, slowing movement speed by 40% and causing an additional 90 Frostfire damage over 9 sec. This spell will be checked against the lower of the target's Frost and Fire resists.

abilitiesData.name: Torment the Weak
abilitiesData.description: Your Frostbolt, Fireball, Frostfire Bolt, Pyroblast, Arcane Missiles, Arcane Blast, and Arcane Barrage abilities deal 12% more damage to snared or slowed targets.

abilitiesData.name: Master of Elements R2
abilitiesData.description: Your spell criticals will refund 20% of their base mana cost.

abilitiesData.name: Blast Wave
abilitiesData.description: A wave of flame radiates outward from the caster, damaging all enemies caught within the blast for 1047 to 1233 Fire damage, knocking them back and dazing them for 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Dragon's Breath
abilitiesData.description: Targets in a cone in front of the caster take 1101 to 1279 Fire damage and are Disoriented for 5 sec. Any direct damaging attack will revive targets. Turns off your attack when used.

abilitiesData.name: Firestarter R1
abilitiesData.description: Your damaging Blast Wave and Dragon's Breath spells have a 50% chance to make your next Flamestrike spell instant cast and cost no mana. Lasts 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Firestarter
abilitiesData.description: Your damaging Blast Wave and Dragon's Breath spells have a 100% chance to make your next Flamestrike spell instant cast and cost no mana. Lasts 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Cold Snap
abilitiesData.description: When activated, this spell finishes the cooldown on all Frost spells you recently cast.

abilitiesData.name: Winter's Chill
abilitiesData.description: Increases your chance to critically hit with Frostbolt by an additional 3% and gives your Frost damage spells a 100% chance to apply the Winter's Chill effect, which increases the chance spells will critically hit the target by 1% for 15 sec. Stacks up to 5 times.

abilitiesData.name: Enduring Winter
abilitiesData.description: Increases the duration of your Summon Water Elemental spell by 15 sec and your Frostbolt spell has a 100% chance to grant up to 10 party or raid members mana regeneration equal to 1% of their maximum mana per 5 sec for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more often than once every 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Fingers of Frost
abilitiesData.description: Gives your Chill effects a 15% chance to grant you the Fingers of Frost effect, which treats your next 2 spells cast as if the target were Frozen. Lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Deep Freeze
abilitiesData.description: Stuns the target for 5 sec. Only usable on Frozen targets. Deals 1469 to 1741 damage to targets permanently immune to stuns.

abilitiesData.name: Brain Freeze
abilitiesData.description: Your Frost damage spells with chilling effects have a 15% chance to cause your next Fireball or Frostfire Bolt spell to be instant cast and cost no mana.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Water Elemental
abilitiesData.description: Summon a Water Elemental to fight for the caster for 45 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Ice Lance
abilitiesData.description: Deals 221 to 255 Frost damage to an enemy target. Causes triple damage against Frozen targets.

abilitiesData.name: Enduring Winter R1
abilitiesData.description: Increases the duration of your Summon Water Elemental spell by 5 sec and your Frostbolt spell has a 33% chance to grant up to 10 party or raid members mana regeneration equal to 1% of their maximum mana per 5 sec for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more often than once every 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Arctic Reach
abilitiesData.description: Increases the range of your Frostbolt, Ice Lance, Deep Freeze and Blizzard spells and the radius of your Frost Nova and Cone of Cold spells by 20%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Blessing of Wisdom
abilitiesData.description: Increases the effect of your Blessing of Wisdom spell by 20%.

abilitiesData.name: Judgement of Light
abilitiesData.description: Unleashes the energy of a Seal spell to judge an enemy for 20 sec, granting attacks made against the judged enemy a chance of healing the attacker for 2% of their maximum health. Refer to individual Seals for additional Judgement effect. Only one Judgement per Paladin can be active at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Judgement of Wisdom
abilitiesData.description: Unleashes the energy of a Seal spell to judge an enemy for 20 sec, giving each attack a chance to restore 2% of the attacker's base mana. Refer to individual Seals for additional Judgement effect. Only one Judgement per Paladin can be active at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Beacon of Light
abilitiesData.description: The target becomes a Beacon of Light to all members of your party or raid within a 60 yard radius. Any heals you cast on party or raid members will also heal the Beacon for 100% of the amount healed. Only one target can be the Beacon of Light at a time. Lasts 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Hand of Sacrifice
abilitiesData.description: Places a Hand on the party or raid member, transfering 30% damage taken to the caster. Lasts 12 sec or until the caster has transfered 100% of their maximum health. Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Hand of Protection
abilitiesData.description: A targeted party or raid member is protected from all physical attacks for 10 sec, but during that time they cannot attack or use physical abilities. Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time. Once protected, the target cannot be targeted by Divine Shield, Divine Protection, or Hand of Protection again for 2 min. Cannot be targeted on players who have used Avenging Wrath within the last 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Aura Mastery
abilitiesData.description: Causes your Concentration Aura to make all affected targets immune to Silence and Interrupt effects and improve the effect of all other auras by 100%. Lasts 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Sacrifice
abilitiesData.description: 30% of all damage taken by party members within 30 yards is redirected to the Paladin (up to a maximum of 40% of the Paladin's health times the number of party members). Damage which reduces the Paladin below 20% health will break the effect. Lasts 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Guardian
abilitiesData.description: When Divine Sacrifice is activated, your party and raid members within 30 yards take 20% reduced damage for 6 sec. In addition, increases the duration of your Sacred Shield by 100% and the amount absorbed by 20%.

abilitiesData.name: Sacred Shield
abilitiesData.description: Each time the target takes damage they gain a Sacred Shield, absorbing 500 damage and increasing the paladin's chance to critically hit with Flash of Light by 50% for up to 6 sec. They cannot gain this effect more than once every 6 sec. Lasts 30 sec. This spell cannot be on more than one target at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Avenging Wrath
abilitiesData.description: Increases all damage and healing caused by 20% for 20 sec. Cannot be used within 30 sec of being the target of Divine Shield, Divine Protection, or Hand of Protection, or of using Lay on Hands on oneself.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Illumination
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the mana cost of all spells by 50% for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Plea
abilitiesData.description: You gain 25% of your total mana over 15 sec, but the amount healed by your Flash of Light, Holy Light, and Holy Shock spells is reduced by 50%.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Favor
abilitiesData.description: When activated, gives your next Flash of Light, Holy Light, or Holy Shock spell a 100% critical effect chance.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Light
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target for 4888 to 5444.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Shock
abilitiesData.description: Blasts the target with Holy energy, causing 1296 to 1402 Holy damage to an enemy, or 2401 to 2599 healing to an ally.

abilitiesData.name: Lay on Hands
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target for an amount equal to the Paladin's maximum health and restores 1950 of their mana. If used on self, the Paladin cannot be targeted by Divine Shield, Divine Protection, Hand of Protection, or self-targeted Lay on Hands again for 2 min. Also cannot be used on self within 30 sec of using Avenging Wrath.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Concentration Aura
abilitiesData.description: Increases the effect of your Concentration Aura by an additional 15% and while any Aura is active reduces the duration of any Silence or Interrupt effect used against an affected group member by 30%. The duration reduction does not stack with any other effects.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Lay on Hands
abilitiesData.description: Grants the target of your Lay on Hands spell 20% reduced physical damage taken for 15 sec. In addition, the cooldown for your Lay on Hands spell is reduced by 4 min.

abilitiesData.name: Blessing of Sanctuary
abilitiesData.description: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, reducing damage taken from all sources by 3% for 10 min and increasing strength and stamina by 10%. In addition, when the target blocks, parries, or dodges a melee attack the target will gain 2% of maximum displayed mana. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Heart of the Crusader
abilitiesData.description: In addition to the normal effect, your Judgement spells will also increase the critical strike chance of all attacks made against that target by an additional 3%.

abilitiesData.name: Judgements of the Just
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Hammer of Justice by 10 sec, increases the duration of your Seal of Justice effect by 1 sec and your Judgement spells also reduce the melee attack speed of the target by 20%.

abilitiesData.name: Seal of Vengeance
abilitiesData.description: Fills the Paladin with holy power, causing attacks to apply Holy Vengeance, which deals (0.013 * Holy power + 0.025 * Attack power) * 5 additional Holy damage over 15 sec. Holy Vengeance can stack up to 5 times. Once stacked to 5 times, each of the Paladin's attacks also deals 33% weapon damage as additional Holy damage. Only one Seal can be active on the Paladin at any one time. Lasts 30 min.
extra: Unleashing this Seal's energy will deal (1 + 0.22 * Holy power + 0.14 * Attack power) Holy damage to an enemy, increased by 10% for each application of Holy Vengeance on the target.

abilitiesData.name: Guarded by the Light
abilitiesData.description: Reduces spell damage taken by 6% and gives a 100% chance to refresh the duration of your Divine Plea when you hit an enemy. In addition, your Divine Plea spell is 100% less likely to be dispelled.

abilitiesData.name: Avenger's Shield
abilitiesData.description: Hurls a holy shield at the enemy, dealing (1100 + 0.07 * Holy power + 0.07 * Attack power to 1344 + 0.07 * Holy power + 0.07 * Attack power) Holy damage, Dazing them and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Affects 3 total targets. Lasts 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Shield
abilitiesData.description: Increases chance to block by 30% for 10 sec and deals 274 Holy damage for each attack blocked while active. Each block expends a charge. 8 charges.

abilitiesData.name: Hammer of the Righteous
abilitiesData.description: Hammer the current target and up to 2 additional nearby targets, causing 4 times your main hand damage per second as Holy damage.

abilitiesData.name: Consecration
abilitiesData.description: Consecrates the land beneath the Paladin, doing 8 * (113 + 0.04 * Holy power + 0.04 * Attack power) Holy damage over 8 sec to enemies who enter the area.

abilitiesData.name: Shield of Righteousness
abilitiesData.description: Slam the target with your shield, causing Holy damage based on your block value plus an additional 520.

abilitiesData.name: Seal of Command
abilitiesData.description: All melee attacks deal additional Holy damage. When used with attacks or abilities that strike a single target, this additional Holy damage will strike up to 2 additional targets. Lasts 30 min.
extra: Unleashing this Seal's energy will judge an enemy, instantly causing Holy damage.

abilitiesData.name: Holy Wrath
abilitiesData.description: Sends bolts of holy power in all directions, causing (1050 + 0.07 * Holy power + 0.07 * Attack power to 1234 + 0.07 * Holy power + 0.07 * Attack power) Holy damage and stunning all Undead and Demon targets within 10 yds for 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Protection
abilitiesData.description: Reduces all damage taken by 50% for 12 sec. Once protected, the target cannot be targeted by Divine Shield, Divine Protection, or Hand of Protection again for 2 min. Cannot be used within 30 sec of using Avenging Wrath.

abilitiesData.name: Ardent Defender
abilitiesData.description: Damage that takes you below 35% health is reduced by 20%. In addition, attacks which would otherwise kill you cause you to be healed by up to 30% of your maximum health (amount healed based on defense). This healing effect cannot occur more often than once every 2 min.

abilitiesData.name: Pursuit of Justice
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the duration of all Disarm effects by 50% and increases movement and mounted movement speed by 15%. This does not stack with other movement speed increasing effects.

abilitiesData.name: Vindication
abilitiesData.description: Gives the Paladin's damaging attacks a chance to reduce the target's attack power by 46 for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Sanctified Retribution
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage caused by Retribution Aura by 50% and all damage caused by friendly targets affected by any of your Auras is increased by 3%.

abilitiesData.name: Judgements of the Wise
abilitiesData.description: Your damaging Judgement spells have a 100% chance to grant the Replenishment effect to up to 10 party or raid members mana regeneration equal to 1% of their maximum mana per 5 sec for 15 sec, and to immediately grant you 25% of your base mana.

abilitiesData.name: Hand of Freedom
abilitiesData.description: Places a Hand on the friendly target, granting immunity to movement impairing effects for 6 sec. Players may only have one Hand on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: The Art of War
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage of your Judgement, Crusader Strike and Divine Storm abilities by 10% and when your melee attacks critically hit your next Flash of Light or Exorcism spell becomes instant cast.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Storm
abilitiesData.description: An instant weapon attack that causes 110% of weapon damage to up to 4 enemies within 8 yards. The Divine Storm heals up to 3 party or raid members totaling 25% of the damage caused.

abilitiesData.name: Hammer of Wrath
abilitiesData.description: Hurls a hammer that strikes an enemy for (1139 + 0.15 * Holy power + 0.15 * Attack power to 1257 + 0.15 * Holy power + 0.15 * Attack power) Holy damage. Only usable on enemies that have 20% or less health.

abilitiesData.name: Crusader Strike
abilitiesData.description: An instant strike that causes 75% weapon damage.

abilitiesData.name: Exorcism
abilitiesData.description: Causes (1028 + 0.15 * Holy power + 0.15 * Attack power to 1146 + 0.15 * Holy power + 0.15 * Attack power) Holy damage to an enemy target. If the target is Undead or Demon, it will always critically hit.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Blessing of Might
abilitiesData.description: Increases the attack power bonus of your Blessing of Might by 25%.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Purpose
abilitiesData.description: Reduces your chance to be hit by spells and ranged attacks by 4% and gives your Hand of Freedom spell a 100% chance to remove any Stun effects on the target.

abilitiesData.name: Inspiration
abilitiesData.description: Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 10% for 15 sec after getting a critical effect from your Flash Heal, Heal, Greater Heal, Binding Heal, Penance, Prayer of Mending, Prayer of Healing, or Circle of Healing spell.

abilitiesData.name: Power Word: Fortitude
abilitiesData.description: Power infuses the target increasing their Stamina by 165 for 30 min.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Spirit
abilitiesData.description: Holy power infuses the target, increasing their Spirit by 80 for 30 min.

abilitiesData.name: Guardian Spirit
abilitiesData.description: Calls upon a guardian spirit to watch over the friendly target. The spirit increases the healing received by the target by 40%, and also prevents the target from dying by sacrificing itself. This sacrifice terminates the effect but heals the target of 50% of their maximum health. Lasts 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Hymn
abilitiesData.description: Heals 3 nearby lowest health friendly party or raid targets within 40 yards for 3024 to 3342 every 2 sec for 8 sec, and increases healing done to them by 10% for 8 sec. Maximum of 12 heals. The Priest must channel to maintain the spell.

abilitiesData.name: Hymn of Hope
abilitiesData.description: Restores 3% mana to 3 nearby low mana friendly party or raid targets every 2 sec for 8 sec, and increases their total maximum mana by 20% for 8 sec. Maximum of 12 mana restores. The Priest must channel to maintain the spell.

abilitiesData.name: Renew
abilitiesData.description: Heals the target for 1400 over 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Flash Heal
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target for 1887 to 2193.

abilitiesData.name: Surge of Light
abilitiesData.description: Your spell criticals have a 50% chance to cause your next Smite or Flash Heal spell to be instant cast, cost no mana but be incapable of a critical hit. This effect lasts 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Binding Heal
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target and the caster for 1952 to 2508. Low threat.

abilitiesData.name: Greater Heal
abilitiesData.description: A slow casting spell that heals a single target for 3950 to 4590.

abilitiesData.name: Serendipity
abilitiesData.description: When you heal with Binding Heal or Flash Heal, the cast time of your next Greater Heal or Prayer of Healing spell is reduced by 12%. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Power Word: Shield
abilitiesData.description: Draws on the soul of the friendly target to shield them, absorbing 2230 damage. Lasts 30 sec. While the shield holds, spellcasting will not be interrupted by damage. Once shielded, the target cannot be shielded again for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Prayer of Mending
abilitiesData.description: Places a spell on the target that heals them for 1043 the next time they take damage. When the heal occurs, Prayer of Mending jumps to a party or raid member within 20 yards. Jumps up to 5 times and lasts 30 sec after each jump. This spell can only be placed on one target at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Shadowfiend
abilitiesData.description: Creates a shadowy fiend to attack the target. Caster receives 5% mana when the Shadowfiend attacks. Damage taken by area of effect attacks is reduced. Lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Prayer of Healing
abilitiesData.description: A powerful prayer heals the friendly target's party members within 30 yards for 2091 to 2209.

abilitiesData.name: Circle of Healing
abilitiesData.description: Heals up to 5 friendly party or raid members within 15 yards of the target for 958 to 1058.

abilitiesData.name: Inner Focus
abilitiesData.description: When activated, reduces the mana cost of your next spell by 100% and increases its critical effect chance by 25% if it is capable of a critical effect.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Healing R2
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Lesser Heal, Heal, Greater Heal, Divine Hymn and Penance spells by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Spell Warding R2
abilitiesData.description: Reduces all spell damage taken by 4%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Renew R2
abilitiesData.description: Increases the amount healed by your Renew spell by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Test of Faith
abilitiesData.description: Increases healing by 12% on friendly targets at or below 50% health.

abilitiesData.name: Body and Soul
abilitiesData.description: When you cast Power Word: Shield, you increase the target's movement speed by 60% for 4 sec, and you have a 100% chance when you cast Abolish Disease on yourself to also cleanse 1 poison effect in addition to diseases.

abilitiesData.name: Empowered Renew
abilitiesData.description: Your Renew spell gains an additional 15% of your bonus healing effects, and your Renew will instantly heal the target for 15% of the total periodic effect.

abilitiesData.name: Mental Agility
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the mana cost of your instant cast spells by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Healing Prayers
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Prayer of Healing and Prayer of Mending spell by 20%.

abilitiesData.name: Renewed Hope
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Flash Heal, Greater Heal and Penance (Heal) spells by 4% on targets afflicted by the Weakened Soul effect, and you have a 100% chance to reduce all damage taken by 3% for 1 min to all friendly party and raid targets when you cast Power Word: Shield. This effect has a 15 sec cooldown.

abilitiesData.name: Pain Suppression
abilitiesData.description: Instantly reduces a friendly target's threat by 5%, reduces all damage taken by 40% and increases resistance to Dispel mechanics by 65% for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Power Infusion
abilitiesData.description: Infuses the target with power, increasing spell casting speed by 20% and reducing the mana cost of all spells by 20%. Lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Grace
abilitiesData.description: Your Flash Heal, Greater Heal, and Penance spells have a 100% chance to bless the target with Grace, increasing all healing received from the Priest by 3%. This effect will stack up to 3 times. Effect lasts 15 sec. Grace can only be active on one target at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Penance
abilitiesData.description: Launches a volley of holy light at the target, causing 375 Holy damage to an enemy, or 1484 to 1676 healing to an ally instantly and every 1 sec for 2 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Weakened Soul
abilitiesData.description: The target's soul is weakened by the force of Power Word: Shield, and cannot be shielded again for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Borrowed Time
abilitiesData.description: Grants 25% spell haste for your next spell after casting Power Word: Shield, and increases the amount absorbed by your Power Word: Shield equal to 40% of your spell power.

abilitiesData.name: Spell Warding
abilitiesData.description: Reduces all spell damage taken by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Renew
abilitiesData.description: Increases the amount healed by your Renew spell by 15%.

abilitiesData.name: Absolution
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Dispel Magic, Cure Disease, Abolish Disease and Mass Dispel spells by 15%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Flash Heal
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Flash Heal by 15%, and increases the critical effect chance of your Flash Heal by 10% on friendly targets at or below 50% health.

abilitiesData.name: Misery
abilitiesData.description: Your Shadow Word: Pain, Mind Flay and Vampiric Touch spells also increase the chance for harmful spells to hit by 3% lasting 24 sec, and increases the benefit from spell power gained by your Mind Blast, Mind Flay and Mind Sear spells by 15%.

abilitiesData.name: Vampiric Touch
abilitiesData.description: Causes 850 Shadow damage over 15 sec to your target and causes up to 10 party or raid members to gain 1% of their maximum mana per 5 sec when you deal damage from Mind Blast. In addition, if the Vampiric Touch is dispelled it will cause 1360 damage to the afflicted target.

abilitiesData.name: Dispersion
abilitiesData.description: You disperse into pure Shadow energy, reducing all damage taken by 90%. You are unable to attack or cast spells, but you regenerate 6% mana every 1 sec for 6 sec. Dispersion can be cast while stunned, feared or silenced and clears all snare and movement impairing effects when cast, and makes you immune to them while dispersed.

abilitiesData.name: Devouring Plague
abilitiesData.description: Afflicts the target with a disease that causes 1376 Shadow damage over 24 sec. 15% of damage caused by the Devouring Plague heals the caster. This spell can only affect one target at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Mind Blast
abilitiesData.description: Blasts the target for 992 to 1048 Shadow damage.

abilitiesData.name: Mind Flay
abilitiesData.description: Assault the target's mind with Shadow energy, causing 588 Shadow damage over 3 sec and slowing their movement speed by 50%.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Weaving
abilitiesData.description: Your Shadow damage spells have a 100% chance to increase the Shadow damage you deal by 2% for 15 sec. Stacks up to 5 times.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Word: Pain
abilitiesData.description: A word of darkness that causes 1380 Shadow damage over 18 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Mind Sear
abilitiesData.description: Causes an explosion of shadow magic around the enemy target, causing 212 to 228 Shadow damage every 1 sec for 5 sec to all enemies within 10 yards around the target.

abilitiesData.name: Meditation
abilitiesData.description: Allows 50% of your mana regeneration to continue while casting.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Shadowform
abilitiesData.description: Your Fade ability now has a 100% chance to remove all movement impairing effects when used while in Shadowform, and reduces casting or channeling time lost when damaged by 70% when casting any Shadow spell while in Shadowform.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Vampiric Embrace
abilitiesData.description: Increases the healing received from Vampiric Embrace by 67%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Psychic Scream
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Psychic Scream spell by 4 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Silence
abilitiesData.description: Silences the target, preventing them from casting spells for 5 sec. Non-player victim spellcasting is also interrupted for 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Master Poisoner
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical hit chance of all attacks made against any target you have poisoned by 3%, reduces the duration of all Poison effects applied to you by 50%, and gives Envenom a 100% chance not to consume Deadly Poison.

abilitiesData.name: Expose Armor
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that exposes the target, reducing armor by 20% and lasting longer per combo point:
extra: 1 point : 6 sec.
2 points: 12 sec.
3 points: 18 sec.
4 points: 24 sec.
5 points: 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Cut to the Chase
abilitiesData.description: Your Eviscerate and Envenom abilities have a 100% chance to refresh your Slice and Dice duration to its 5 combo point maximum.

abilitiesData.name: Slice and Dice
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that increases melee attack speed by 40%. Lasts longer per combo point:
extra: 1 point  : 9 seconds
2 points: 12 seconds
3 points: 15 seconds
4 points: 18 seconds
5 points: 21 seconds

abilitiesData.name: Fan of Knives
abilitiesData.description: Instantly throw both weapons at all targets within 8 yards, causing 105% weapon damage with daggers, and 70% weapon damage with all other weapons.

abilitiesData.name: Stealth
abilitiesData.description: Allows the rogue to sneak around, but reduces your speed by 30%. Lasts until cancelled.

abilitiesData.name: Overkill
abilitiesData.description: While stealthed, and for 20 seconds after breaking stealth, you regenerate 30% additional energy.

abilitiesData.name: Tricks of the Trade
abilitiesData.description: The current party or raid member becomes the target of your Tricks of the Trade. The threat caused by your next damaging attack and all actions taken for 6 sec afterwards will be transferred to the target. In addition, all damage caused by the target is increased by 15% during this time.

abilitiesData.name: Mutilate
abilitiesData.description: Instantly attacks with both weapons for 100% weapon damage plus an additional 181 with each weapon. Damage is increased by 20% against Poisoned targets. Awards 2 combo points.

abilitiesData.name: Hunger For Blood
abilitiesData.description: Enrages you, increasing all damage caused by 5%. Requires a bleed effect to be active on the target. Lasts 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Envenom
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that consumes your Deadly Poison doses on the target and deals instant poison damage. Following the Envenom attack you have an additional 15% chance to apply Deadly Poison and a 75% increased frequency of applying Instant Poison for 1 sec plus an additional 1 sec per combo point. One dose is consumed for each combo point:
extra: 1 dose: (216-1) * 1 + Attack power * 0.09 damage
2 doses: (216-1) * 2 + Attack power * 0.18 damage
3 doses: (216-1) * 3 + Attack power * 0.27 damage
4 doses: (216-1) * 4 + Atack power * 0.36 damage
5 doses: (216-1) * 5 + Attack power * 0.45 damage

abilitiesData.name: Cold Blood
abilitiesData.description: When activated, increases the critical strike chance of your next offensive ability by 100%.

abilitiesData.name: Vanish
abilitiesData.description: Allows the rogue to vanish from sight, entering an improved stealth mode for 10 sec. Also breaks movement impairing effects. More effective than Vanish (Rank 2).

abilitiesData.name: Shadowmeld
abilitiesData.description: Activate to slip into the shadows, reducing the chance for enemies to detect your presence. Lasts until cancelled or upon moving. Any threat is restored versus enemies still in combat upon cancellation of this effect.

abilitiesData.name: Garrote
abilitiesData.description: Garrote the enemy, causing (71 + Attack power * 0.07) * 6 damage over 18 sec, increased by your attack power. Must be stealthed and behind the target. Awards 1 combo point.

abilitiesData.name: Rupture
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that causes damage over time, increased by your attack power. Lasts longer per combo point:
extra: 1 point : (127 + 18 * 1 + 0.015 * Attack power) * 4 damage over 8 secs
2 point : (127 + 18 * 2 + 0.024 * Attack power) * 4 damage over 10 secs
3 point : (127 + 18 * 3 + 0.03 * Attack power) * 4 damage over 12 secs
4 point : (127 + 18 * 4 + 0.03428571 * Attack power) * 4 damage over 14 secs
1 point : (127 + 18 * 5 + 0.0375 * Attack power) * 4 damage over 16 secs

abilitiesData.name: Savage Combat
abilitiesData.description: Increases your total attack power by 4% and all physical damage caused to enemies you have poisoned is increased by 4%.

abilitiesData.name: Sinister Strike
abilitiesData.description: An instant strike that causes 180 damage in addition to 100% of your normal weapon damage. Awards 1 combo point.

abilitiesData.name: Blade Flurry
abilitiesData.description: Increases your attack speed by 20%. In addition, attacks strike an additional nearby opponent. Lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Killing Spree
abilitiesData.description: Step through the shadows from enemy to enemy within 10 yards, attacking an enemy every .5 secs with both weapons until 5 assaults are made, and increasing all damage done by 20% for the duration. Can hit the same target multiple times. Cannot hit invisible or stealthed targets.

abilitiesData.name: Adrenaline Rush
abilitiesData.description: Increases your Energy regeneration rate by 100% for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Eviscerate
abilitiesData.description: Finishing move that causes damage per combo point:
extra: 1 point : 127 + ((370 * 1) + Attack power * 0.03) * 1 - 381 + ((370 * 1) + Attack power * 0.07) * 1 damage
2 point : 127 + ((370 * 2) + Attack power * 0.06) * 1 - 381 + ((370 * 2) + Attack power * 0.14) * 1 damage
3 point : 127 + ((370 * 3) + Attack power * 0.09) * 1 - 381 + ((370 * 3) + Attack power * 0.21) * 1 damage
4 point : 127 + ((370 * 4) + Attack power * 0.12) * 1 - 381 + ((370 * 4) + Attack power * 0.28) * 1 damage
6 point : 127 + ((370 * 5) + Attack power * 0.15) * 1 - 381 + ((370 * 5) + Attack power * 0.35) * 1 damage

abilitiesData.name: Blood Spatter
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage caused by your Garrote and Rupture abilities by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Ruthlessness
abilitiesData.description: Gives your melee finishing moves a 60% chance to add a combo point to your target.

abilitiesData.name: Hack and Slash
abilitiesData.description: Gives you a 5% chance to get an extra attack on the same target after hitting your target with your Sword or Axe.

abilitiesData.name: Mace Specialization
abilitiesData.description: Your attacks with maces ignore up to 15% of your opponent's armor.

abilitiesData.name: Close Quarters Combat
abilitiesData.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with Daggers and Fist Weapons by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Honor Among Thieves
abilitiesData.description: When anyone in your group critically hits with a damage or healing spell or ability, you have a 100% chance to gain a combo point on your current target. This effect cannot occur more than once every second.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Dance
abilitiesData.description: Enter the Shadow Dance for 6 sec, allowing the use of Sap, Garrote, Ambush, Cheap Shot, Premeditation, Pickpocket and Disarm Trap regardless of being stealthed.

abilitiesData.name: Ambush
abilitiesData.description: Ambush the target, causing 275% weapon damage plus 908 to the target. Must be stealthed and behind the target. Requires a dagger in the main hand. Awards 2 combo points.

abilitiesData.name: Shadowstep
abilitiesData.description: Attempts to step through the shadows and reappear behind your enemy and increases movement speed by 70% for 3 sec. The damage of your next ability is increased by 20% and the threat caused is reduced by 50%. Lasts 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Premeditation
abilitiesData.description: When used, adds 2 combo points to your target. You must add to or use those combo points within 20 sec or the combo points are lost.

abilitiesData.name: Backstab
abilitiesData.description: Backstab the target, causing 150% weapon damage plus 465 to the target. Must be behind the target. Requires a dagger in the main hand. Awards 1 combo point.

abilitiesData.name: Totem of Wrath
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Totem of Wrath with 5 health at the feet of the caster. The totem increases spell power by 280 for all party and raid members, and increases the critical strike chance of all attacks by 3% against all enemies within 40 yards. Lasts 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Elemental Focus
abilitiesData.description: After landing a non-periodic critical strike with a Fire, Frost, or Nature damage spell, you enter a Clearcasting state. The Clearcasting state reduces the mana cost of your next 2 damage or healing spells by 40%.

abilitiesData.name: Lightning Overload
abilitiesData.description: Gives your Lightning Bolt and Chain Lightning spells a 33% chance to cast a second, similar spell on the same target at no additional cost that causes half damage and no threat.

abilitiesData.name: Water Shield
abilitiesData.description: The caster is surrounded by 3 globes of water, granting 100 mana per 5 sec. When a spell, melee or ranged attack hits the caster, 400 mana is restored to the caster. This expends one water globe. Only one globe will activate every few seconds. Lasts 10 min. Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Mana Spring Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Mana Spring Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 5 min that restores 91 mana every 5 seconds to all party and raid members within 30 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Flame Shock
abilitiesData.description: Instantly sears the target with fire, causing 500 Fire damage immediately and 834 Fire damage over 18 sec. This periodic damage may critically strike and will occur more rapidly based on the caster's spell haste.

abilitiesData.name: Elemental Mastery
abilitiesData.description: When activated, your next Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning or Lava Burst spell becomes an instant cast spell. In addition, you gain 15% spell haste for 15 sec. Elemental Mastery shares a cooldown with Nature's Swiftness.

abilitiesData.name: Lava Burst
abilitiesData.description: You hurl molten lava at the target, dealing 1192 to 1518 Fire damage. If your Flame Shock is on the target, Lava Burst will deal a critical strike.

abilitiesData.name: Lightning Bolt
abilitiesData.description: Casts a bolt of lightning at the target for 715 to 815 Nature damage.

abilitiesData.name: Thunderstorm
abilitiesData.description: You call down a bolt of lightning, energizing you and damaging nearby enemies within 10 yards. Restores 8% mana to you and deals 1450 to 1656 Nature damage to all nearby enemies, knocking them back 20 yards. This spell is usable while stunned.

abilitiesData.name: Fire Elemental Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons an elemental totem that calls forth a greater fire elemental to rain destruction on the caster's enemies. Lasts 2 min.

abilitiesData.name: Magma Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Magma Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 20 sec that causes 371 Fire damage to creatures within 8 yards every 2 seconds.

abilitiesData.name: Fire Nova
abilitiesData.description: Causes the shaman's active Fire totem to emit a wave of flames, inflicting 893 to 997 Fire damage to enemies within 10 yards of the totem.

abilitiesData.name: Chain Lightning
abilitiesData.description: Hurls a lightning bolt at the enemy, dealing 973 to 1111 Nature damage and then jumping to additional nearby enemies. Each jump reduces the damage by 30%. Affects 3 total targets.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Fire Nova
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage done by your Fire Nova by 20% and reduces the cooldown by 4 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Convection
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Shock, Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Lava Burst, and Wind Shear spells by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Ghost Wolf
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the cast time of your Ghost Wolf spell by 2 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Unleashed Rage
abilitiesData.description: Increases your expertise by 9, and increases all party and raid members' attack power by 10% while within 100 yards of the Shaman.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Windfury Totem
abilitiesData.description: Increases the melee haste granted by your Windfury totem by 4%.

abilitiesData.name: Maelstrom Weapon
abilitiesData.description: When you deal damage with a melee weapon, you have a chance (higher than rank 4) to reduce the cast time of your next Lightning Bolt, Chain Lightning, Lesser Healing Wave, Healing Wave, Chain Heal, or Hex spell by 20%. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Call of the Elements
abilitiesData.description: Simultaneously places up to 4 totems specified in the Totem Bar.

abilitiesData.name: Lightning Shield
abilitiesData.description: The caster is surrounded by 3 balls of lightning. When a spell, melee or ranged attack hits the caster, the attacker will be struck for 380 Nature damage. This expends one lightning ball. Only one ball will fire every few seconds. Lasts 10 min. Only one Elemental Shield can be active on the Shaman at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Feral Spirit
abilitiesData.description: Summons two Spirit Wolves under the command of the Shaman, lasting 45 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Stormstrike
abilitiesData.description: Instantly attack with both weapons. In addition, the next 4 sources of Nature damage dealt to the target from the Shaman are increased by 20%. Lasts 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Earth Shock
abilitiesData.description: Instantly shocks the target with concussive force, causing 849 to 895 Nature damage and reducing melee attack speed by 10% for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Strength of Earth Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Strength of Earth Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster. The totem increases the strength and agility of all party and raid members within 30 yards by 155. Lasts 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Windfury Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Windfury Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster. The totem provides 16% melee haste to all party and raid members within 30 yards. Lasts 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Shamanistic Rage
abilitiesData.description: Reduces all damage taken by 30% and gives your successful melee attacks a chance to regenerate mana equal to 15% of your attack power. This spell is usable while stunned. Lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Lava Lash
abilitiesData.description: You charge your off-hand weapon with lava, instantly dealing 100% off-hand Weapon damage. Damage is increased by 25% if your off-hand weapon is enchanted with Flametongue.

abilitiesData.name: Flametongue Weapon
abilitiesData.description: Imbue the Shaman's weapon with fire, increasing total spell damage by 211. Each hit causes 88.96 to 274 additional Fire damage, based on the speed of the weapon. Slower weapons cause more fire damage per swing. Lasts 30 minutes.

abilitiesData.name: Windfury Weapon
abilitiesData.description: Imbue the Shaman's weapon with wind. Each hit has a 20% chance of dealing additional damage equal to two extra attacks with 1250 extra attack power. Lasts 30 minutes.

abilitiesData.name: Shamanistic Focus
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the mana cost of your Shock spells by 45%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Stormstrike R1
abilitiesData.description: When you Stormstrike, you have a 50% chance to immediately grant you 20% of your base mana.

abilitiesData.name: Ancestral Healing
abilitiesData.description: Reduces your target's physical damage taken by 10% for 15 sec after getting a critical effect from one of your healing spells.

abilitiesData.name: Restorative Totems
abilitiesData.description: Increases the effect of your Mana Spring Totem by 12%, and increases the amount healed by your Healing Stream Totem by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Chain Heal
abilitiesData.description: Heals the friendly target for 1055 to 1205, then jumps to heal additional nearby targets. If cast on a party member, the heal will only jump to other party members. Each jump reduces the effectiveness of the heal by 40%. Heals 3 total targets.

abilitiesData.name: Riptide
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target for 1604 to 1736 and another 1670 over 15 sec. Your next Chain Heal cast on that primary target within 15 sec will consume the healing over time effect and increase the amount of the Chain Heal by 25%.

abilitiesData.name: Tidal Waves
abilitiesData.description: When you cast Chain Heal or Riptide, you have a 100% chance to lower the cast time of your Healing Wave spell by 30% and increase the critical effect chance of your Lesser Healing Wave spell by 25%, until two such spells have been cast. In addition, your Healing Wave gains an additional 20% of your bonus healing effects and your Lesser Healing Wave gains an additional 10% of your bonus healing effects.

abilitiesData.name: Healing Wave
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target for 3034 to 3466.

abilitiesData.name: Lesser Healing Wave
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target for 1606 to 1834.

abilitiesData.name: Stoneskin Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Stoneskin Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster. The totem protects party and raid members within 30 yards, increasing armor by 1150. Lasts 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Healing Stream Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Healing Stream Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 5 min that heals group members within 30 yards for 10 every 2 seconds.

abilitiesData.name: Flametongue Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Flametongue Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster. Party and raid members within 30 yards of the totem have their spell damage and healing increased by up to 144. Lasts 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Nature's Swiftness V2
abilitiesData.description: When activated, your next Nature spell with a base casting time less than 10 sec. becomes an instant cast spell. Nature's Swiftness shares a cooldown with Elemental Mastery.

abilitiesData.name: Earth Shield
abilitiesData.description: Protects the target with an earthen shield, reducing casting or channeling time lost when damaged by 30% and causing attacks to heal the shielded target for 337. This effect can only occur once every few seconds. 6 charges. Lasts 10 min. Earth Shield can only be placed on one target at a time and only one Elemental Shield can be active on a target at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Elemental Weapons
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage caused by your Windfury Weapon effect by 40% increases the spell damage on your Flametongue Weapon by 30% and increases the bonus healing on your Earthliving Weapon by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Fel Intelligence
abilitiesData.description: Increases party and raid members Intellect by 48 and Spirit by 64.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Shadow Bolt
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage done by your Shadow Bolt spell by 10%, and your Shadow Bolt has a 100% chance to cause your target to be vulnerable to spell damage, increasing spell critical strike chance against that target by 5%. Effect lasts 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Curse of the Elements
abilitiesData.description: Curses the target for 5 min, reducing Arcane, Fire, Frost, Nature, and Shadow resistances by 165 and increasing magic damage taken by 13%. Only one Curse per Warlock can be active on any one target.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Curse of Weakness
abilitiesData.description: Increases the amount of attack power reduced by your Curse of Weakness by 20%.

abilitiesData.name: Haunt
abilitiesData.description: You send a ghostly soul into the target, dealing 645 to 753 Shadow damage and increasing all damage done by your Shadow damage-over-time effects on the target by 20% for 12 sec. When the Haunt spell ends or is dispelled, the soul returns to you, healing you for 100% of the damage it did to the target.

abilitiesData.name: Drain Soul
abilitiesData.description: Drains the soul of the target, causing 710 Shadow damage over 15 sec. If the target is at or below 25% health, Drain Soul causes four times the normal damage. If the target dies while being drained, and yields experience or honor, the caster gains a Soul Shard. Each time the Drain Soul damages the target, it also has a chance to generate a Soul Shard. Soul Shards are required for other spells.

abilitiesData.name: Seed of Corruption
abilitiesData.description: Imbeds a demon seed in the enemy target, causing 1518 Shadow damage over 18 sec. When the target takes 1518 total damage or dies, the seed will inflict 1633 to 1897 Shadow damage to all enemies within 15 yards of the target. Only one Corruption spell per Warlock can be active on any one target.

abilitiesData.name: Life Tap
abilitiesData.description: Converts (2000 + Spirit * 1.5 health) into (2000 * 1 + Shadow power *.5 * 1 mana). Spell power increases the amount of mana returned.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Bolt
abilitiesData.description: Sends a shadowy bolt at the enemy, causing 690 to 770 Shadow damage.

abilitiesData.name: Unstable Affliction
abilitiesData.description: Shadow energy slowly destroys the target, causing 1150 damage over 15 sec. In addition, if the Unstable Affliction is dispelled it will cause 2070 damage to the dispeller and silence them for 5 sec. Only one Unstable Affliction or Immolate per Warlock can be active on any one target.

abilitiesData.name: Corruption
abilitiesData.description: Corrupts the target, causing 1080 Shadow damage over 18 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Curse of Agony
abilitiesData.description: Curses the target with agony, causing 1740 Shadow damage over 24 sec. This damage is dealt slowly at first, and builds up as the Curse reaches its full duration. Only one Curse per Warlock can be active on any one target.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Felhunter
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Felhunter under the command of the Warlock.

abilitiesData.name: Everlasting Affliction
abilitiesData.description: Your Corruption and Unstable Affliction spells gain an additional 5% of your bonus spell damage, and your Drain Life, Drain Soul, Shadow Bolt, and Haunt spells have a 100% chance to reset the duration of your Corruption spell on the target.

abilitiesData.name: Death's Embrace
abilitiesData.description: Increases the amount drained by your Drain Life by 30% while your health is at or below 20% health, and increases the damage done by your Shadow spells by 12% when your target is at or below 35% health.

abilitiesData.name: Shadowflame
abilitiesData.description: Targets in a cone in front of the caster take 615 to 671 Shadow damage and an additional 644 Fire damage over 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Demonic Pact
abilitiesData.description: Increases your spell damage by 10%, and your pet's criticals apply the Demonic Pact effect to your party or raid members. Demonic Pact increases spell power by 10% of your Spell Damage for 45 sec. This effect has a 20 sec cooldown. Does not work on Enslaved demons.

abilitiesData.name: Incinerate
abilitiesData.description: Deals 582 to 676 Fire damage to your target and an additional 145.5 to 169 Fire damage if the target is affected by an Immolate spell.

abilitiesData.name: Molten Core
abilitiesData.description: Increases the duration of your Immolate by 6 sec, and you have a 8% chance to gain the Molten Core effect when your Corruption deals damage. The Molten Core effect empowers your next 3 Incinerate or Soul Fire spells cast within 15 sec.
extra: Incinerate - Increases damage done by 12% and reduces cast time by 20%.
Soul Fire - Increases damage done by 12% and increases critical strike chance by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Soul Fire
abilitiesData.description: Burn the enemy's soul, causing 1323 to 1657 Fire damage.

abilitiesData.name: Decimation
abilitiesData.description: When you Shadowbolt, Incinerate or Soul Fire a target that is at or below 35% health, the cast time of your Soul Fire spell is reduced by 40% for 10 sec. Soul Fires cast under the effect of Decimation cost no shard.

abilitiesData.name: Metamorphosis
abilitiesData.description: You transform into a Demon for 30 sec. This form increases your armor contribution from items by 600%, damage by 20%, reduces the chance you'll be critically hit by melee attacks by 6% and reduces the duration of stun and snare effects by 50%. You gain some unique demon abilities in addition to your normal abilities.

abilitiesData.name: Demonic Empowerment
abilitiesData.description: Grants the Warlock's summoned demon Empowerment.
extra: Imp - Increases the Imp's spell critical strike chance by 20% for 30 sec.
Voidwalker - Increases the Voidwalker's health by 20%, and its threat generated from spells and attacks by 20% for 20 sec.
Succubus - Instantly vanishes, causing the Succubus to go into an improved Invisibility state. The vanish effect removes all stuns, snares and movement impairing effects from the Succubus.
Felhunter - Dispels all magical effects from the Felhunter.
Felguard - Increases the Felguard's attack speed by 20% and breaks all stun, snare and movement impairing effects and makes your Felguard immune to them for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Immolate
abilitiesData.description: Burns the enemy for 460 Fire damage and then an additional 785 Fire damage over 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Curse of Doom
abilitiesData.description: Curses the target with impending doom, causing 7300 Shadow damage after 1 min. If the target yields experience or honor when it dies from this damage, a Doomguard will be summoned. Cannot be cast on players.

abilitiesData.name: Immolation Aura
abilitiesData.description: Ignites the area surrounds you, causing 251 Fire damage to all nearby enemies every 1 sec. Lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Felguard
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Felguard under the command of the Warlock.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Demonic Tactics
abilitiesData.description: Increases your summoned demon's critical strike chance equal to 30% of your critical strike chance.

abilitiesData.name: Nemesis
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Demonic Empowerment, Metamorphosis, and Fel Domination spells by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Suppression
abilitiesData.description: Increases your chance to hit with spells by 3%, and reduces the mana cost of your Affliction spells by 6%.

abilitiesData.name: Intensity-alternate
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting or channeling any Destruction spell by 70%.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Pact
abilitiesData.description: Increases party and raid members' health by 1330.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Imp
abilitiesData.description: Increases the effect of your Imp's Firebolt, Fire Shield, and Blood Pact spells by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Backdraft
abilitiesData.description: When you cast Conflagrate, the cast time and global cooldown of your next three Destruction spells is reduced by 30%. Lasts 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Chaos Bolt
abilitiesData.description: Sends a bolt of chaotic fire at the enemy, dealing 1429 to 1813 Fire damage. Chaos Bolt cannot be resisted, and pierces through all absorption effects.

abilitiesData.name: Conflagrate
abilitiesData.description: Consumes an Immolate or Shadowflame effect on the enemy target to instantly deal damage equal to 60% of your Immolate or Shadowflame, and causes an additional 40% damage over 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Imp
abilitiesData.description: Summons an Imp under the command of the Warlock.

abilitiesData.name: Pyroclasm
abilitiesData.description: When you critically strike with Searing Pain or Conflagrate, your Fire and Shadow spell damage is increased by 6% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Unholy Power R3
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage done by your Voidwalker, Succubus, Felhunter and Felguard's melee attacks and your Imp's Firebolt by 12%.

abilitiesData.name: Soul Link
abilitiesData.description: When active, 20% of all damage taken by the caster is taken by your Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, Felhunter, Felguard, or enslaved demon instead. That damage cannot be prevented. Lasts as long as the demon is active and controlled.

abilitiesData.name: Fel Domination
abilitiesData.description: Your next Imp, Voidwalker, Succubus, Felhunter or Felguard Summon spell has its casting time reduced by 5.5 sec and its Mana cost reduced by 50%.

abilitiesData.name: Destructive Reach
abilitiesData.description: Increases the range of your Destruction spells by 20% and reduces threat caused by Destruction spells by 20%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Corruption R1
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage done by your Corruption by 2%, and increases the critical strike chance of your Seed of Corruption by 1%.

abilitiesData.name: Soul Leech
abilitiesData.description: Gives your Shadow Bolt, Shadowburn, Chaos Bolt, Soul Fire, Incinerate, Searing Pain and Conflagrate spells a 30% chance to return health equal to 20% of the damage caused.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Soul Leech
abilitiesData.description: Your Soul Leech effect also restores mana to you and your summoned demon equal to 2% of maximum mana, and has a 100% chance to grant up to 10 party or raid members mana regeneration equal to 1% of maximum mana per 5 sec. Lasts for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Trauma
abilitiesData.description: Your melee critical strikes increase the effectiveness of Bleed effects on the target by 30% for 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Frenzy
abilitiesData.description: Increases your melee attack speed by 10%. In addition your Rend and Deep Wounds abilities also increase all physical damage caused to that target by 4%.

abilitiesData.name: Battle Shout
abilitiesData.description: The warrior shouts, increasing attack power of all raid and party members within 30 yards by 550. Lasts 2 min.

abilitiesData.name: Demoralizing Shout
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the melee attack power of all enemies within 10 yards by 411 for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Heroic Strike
abilitiesData.description: A strong attack that increases melee damage by 495 and causes a high amount of threat. Causes 173 additional damage against Dazed targets.

abilitiesData.name: Cleave
abilitiesData.description: A sweeping attack that does your weapon damage plus 222 to the target and his nearest ally.

abilitiesData.name: Berserker Rage
abilitiesData.description: The warrior enters a berserker rage, removing and granting immunity to Fear, Sap and Incapacitate effects and generating extra rage when taking damage. Lasts 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Bloodrage
abilitiesData.description: Generates 20 rage at the cost of health, and then generates an additional 10 rage over 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Charge
abilitiesData.description: Charge an enemy, generate 15 rage, and stun it for 1.5 sec. Cannot be used in combat.

abilitiesData.name: Rend
abilitiesData.requirement: Battle Stance, Defensive Stance, Melee Weapon
abilitiesData.description: Wounds the target causing them to bleed for 380 damage plus an additional (based on weapon damage) over 15 sec. If used while your target is above 75% health, Rend does 35% more damage.

abilitiesData.name: Mortal Strike
abilitiesData.description: A vicious strike that deals weapon damage plus 380 and wounds the target, reducing the effectiveness of any healing by 50% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Slam
abilitiesData.description: Slams the opponent, causing weapon damage plus 250.

abilitiesData.name: Overpower
abilitiesData.description: Instantly overpower the enemy, causing weapon damage plus 35. Only useable after the target dodges. The Overpower cannot be blocked, dodged or parried.

abilitiesData.name: Execute
abilitiesData.requirement: Battle Stance, Berserker Stance, Melee Weapon
abilitiesData.description: Attempt to finish off a wounded foe, causing (1456 + Attack power * 0.2) damage and converting each extra point of rage into 38 additional damage (up to a maximum cost of 30 rage). Only usable on enemies that have less than 20% health.

abilitiesData.name: Sudden Death
abilitiesData.description: Your melee hits have a 9% chance of allowing the use of Execute regardless of the target's health state. In addition, you keep at least 10 rage after using Execute.

abilitiesData.name: Bladestorm
abilitiesData.description: Instantly Whirlwind up to 4 nearby targets and for the next 6 sec you will perform a whirlwind attack every 1 sec. While under the effects of Bladestorm, you can move but cannot perform any other abilities but you do not feel pity or remorse or fear and you cannot be stopped unless killed.

abilitiesData.name: Taste for Blood
abilitiesData.description: Whenever your Rend ability causes damage, you have a 100% chance of allowing the use of your Overpower ability for 9 sec. 1 charge. This effect will not occur more than once every 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Sweeping Strikes
abilitiesData.description: Your next 5 melee attacks strike an additional nearby opponent.

abilitiesData.name: Thunder Clap
abilitiesData.description: Blasts nearby enemies increasing the time between their attacks by 10% for 30 sec and doing 300 damage to them. Damage increased by attack power. This ability causes additional threat.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Execute
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the rage cost of your Execute ability by 5.

abilitiesData.name: Anger Management
abilitiesData.description: Generates 1 rage per 3 seconds.

abilitiesData.name: Weapon Mastery
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the chance for your attacks to be dodged by 2% and reduces the duration of all Disarm effects used against you by 50%. This does not stack with other Disarm duration reducing effects.

abilitiesData.name: Commanding Presence
abilitiesData.description: Increases the melee attack power bonus of your Battle Shout and the health bonus of your Commanding Shout by 25%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Cleave
abilitiesData.description: Increases the bonus damage done by your Cleave ability by 120%.

abilitiesData.name: Unbridled Wrath R2
abilitiesData.description: Gives you a chance to generate an additional rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon. Effect occurs more often than Unbridled Wrath (Rank 1).

abilitiesData.name: Incite
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Heroic Strike, Thunder Clap and Cleave abilities by 15%.

abilitiesData.name: Rampage
abilitiesData.description: Increases ranged and melee critical hit chance of all party and raid members within 100 yds by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Intercept
abilitiesData.description: Charge an enemy, causing (Attack power * 0.12) damage (based on attack power) and stunning it for 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Heroic Throw
abilitiesData.description: Throws your weapon at the enemy causing (12 + Attack power * .50) damage (based on attack power). This ability causes high threat.

abilitiesData.name: Whirlwind
abilitiesData.description: In a whirlwind of steel you attack up to 4 enemies within 8 yards, causing weapon damage from both melee weapons to each enemy.

abilitiesData.name: Bloodthirst
abilitiesData.description: Instantly attack the target causing (Attack power * 50 / 100) damage. In addition, the next 3 successful melee attacks will restore 1% of max health. This effect lasts 8 sec. Damage is based on your attack power.

abilitiesData.name: Recklessness
abilitiesData.description: Your next 3 special ability attacks have an additional 100% to critically hit but all damage taken is increased by 20%. Lasts 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Death Wish
abilitiesData.description: When activated you become enraged, increasing your physical damage by 20% but increasing all damage taken by 5%. Lasts 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Heroic Fury
abilitiesData.description: Removes any Immobilization effects and refreshes the cooldown of your Intercept ability.

abilitiesData.name: Enrage-alternate
abilitiesData.description: Gives you a 30% chance to receive a 10% damage bonus for 12 sec after being the victim of a damaging attack. This effect does not stack with Wrecking Crew.

abilitiesData.name: Precision
abilitiesData.description: Increases your chance to hit with melee weapons by 3%.

abilitiesData.name: Sunder Armor
abilitiesData.description: Sunders the target's armor, reducing it by 785 per Sunder Armor and causes a high amount of threat. Threat increased by attack power. Can be applied up to 5 times. Lasts until cancelled.

abilitiesData.name: Vigilance
