abilitiesData.description: Focus your protective gaze on a group or raid target, reducing their damage taken by 3% and transfers 10% of the threat they cause to you. In addition, each time they are hit by an attack your Taunt cooldown is refreshed. Lasts 30 min. This effect can only be on one target at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Thunder Clap
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the cost of your Thunder Clap ability by 4 rage points and increases the damage by 30% and the slowing effect by an additional 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Retaliation
abilitiesData.description: Instantly counterattack any enemy that strikes you in melee for 12 sec. Melee attacks made from behind cannot be counterattacked. A maximum of 20 attacks will cause retaliation.

abilitiesData.name: Shield Slam
abilitiesData.description: Slam the target with your shield, causing 990 to 1040 damage, modified by your shield block value, and dispels 1 magic effect on the target. Also causes a high amount of threat.

abilitiesData.name: Sword and Board
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Devastate ability by 15% and when your Devastate or Revenge ability deals damage it has a 30% chance of refreshing the cooldown of your Shield Slam ability and reducing its cost by 100% for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Revenge
abilitiesData.description: Instantly counterattack an enemy for (1636 + Attack power * 0.310 to 1998 + Attack power * 0.310) damage. Revenge is only usable after the warrior blocks, dodges or parries an attack.

abilitiesData.name: Devastate
abilitiesData.description: Sunder the target's armor causing the Sunder Armor effect. In addition, causes 120% of weapon damage plus 242 for each application of Sunder Armor on the target. The Sunder Armor effect can stack up to 5 times.

abilitiesData.name: Shockwave
abilitiesData.description: Sends a wave of force in front of the warrior, causing (75 / 100 * Attack power) damage (based on attack power) and stunning all enemy targets within 10 yards in a frontal cone for 4 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Enraged Regeneration
abilitiesData.description: You regenerate 30% of your total health over 10 sec. This ability requires an Enrage effect, consumes all Enrage effects and prevents any from affecting you for the full duration.

abilitiesData.name: Last Stand
abilitiesData.description: When activated, this ability temporarily grants you 30% of your maximum health for 20 sec. After the effect expires, the health is lost.

abilitiesData.name: Shield Block
abilitiesData.description: Increases your chance to block and block value by 100% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Shield Wall
abilitiesData.description: Reduces all damage taken by 60% for 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Impale
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your abilities by 20%.

abilitiesData.name: Deep Wounds
abilitiesData.description: Your critical strikes cause the opponent to bleed, dealing 48% of your melee weapon's average damage over 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Booming Voice
abilitiesData.description: Increases the area of effect and duration of your Battle Shout, Demoralizing Shout and Commanding Shout by 50%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Demoralizing Shout
abilitiesData.description: Increases the melee attack power reduction of your Demoralizing Shout by 40%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Heroic Strike
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the cost of your Heroic Strike ability by 3 rage points.

abilitiesData.name: Abomination's Might
abilitiesData.description: Increases the attack power by 10% of party and raid members within 100 yards. Also increases your total Strength by 2%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Icy Talons
abilitiesData.description: Increases the melee haste of all party and raid members within 100 yds by 20% and your haste by an additional 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Icy Touch
abilitiesData.description: Your Icy Touch does an additional 15% damage and your Frost Fever reduces melee and ranged attack speed by an additional 6%.

abilitiesData.name: Horn of Winter
abilitiesData.description: The Death Knight blows the Horn of Winter, which generates 10 runic power and increases total Strength and Agility of all party or raid members within 30 yards by 155. Lasts 2 min.

abilitiesData.name: Icy Touch
abilitiesData.description: Chills the target for 227 to 245 Frost damage and infects them with Frost Fever, a disease that deals periodic damage and reduces melee and ranged attack speed by 14% for 15 sec. Very high threat when in Frost Presence.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Tap
abilitiesData.description: Immediately activates a Blood Rune and converts it into a Death Rune for the next 20 sec. Death Runes count as a Blood, Frost or Unholy Rune.

abilitiesData.name: Empower Rune Weapon
abilitiesData.description: Empower your rune weapon, immediately activating all your runes and generating 25 runic power.

abilitiesData.name: Plague Strike
abilitiesData.description: A vicious strike that deals 50% weapon damage plus 189 and infects the target with Blood Plague, a disease dealing Shadow damage over time.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Strike
abilitiesData.description: Instantly strike the enemy, causing 40% weapon damage plus 306, total damage increased by 12.5% for each of your diseases on the target.

abilitiesData.name: Frost Presence
abilitiesData.description: The death knight takes on the presence of frost, increasing Stamina by 8%, armor contribution from cloth, leather, mail and plate items by 60%, and reducing damage taken by 8%. Increases threat generated. Only one Presence may be active at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Hysteria
abilitiesData.description: Induces a friendly unit into a killing frenzy for 30 sec. The target is Enraged, which increases their physical damage by 20%, but causes them to lose health equal to 1% of their maximum health every second.

abilitiesData.name: Rune Strike
abilitiesData.description: Strike the target for 150% weapon damage plus (150 * Attack power * 10 / 10000). Only usable after the Death Knight dodges or parries. Can't be dodged, blocked, or parried. This attack causes a high amount of threat.

abilitiesData.name: Death Strike
abilitiesData.description: A deadly attack that deals 75% weapon damage plus 223 and heals the Death Knight for 5% of their maximum health for each of their diseases on the target.

abilitiesData.name: Death Rune Mastery
abilitiesData.description: Whenever you hit with Death Strike or Obliterate there is a 100% chance that the Frost and Unholy Runes will become Death Runes when they activate. Death Runes count as a Blood, Frost or Unholy Rune.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Plague
abilitiesData.description: A disease dealing Shadow damage every 3 sec for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Frost Fever
abilitiesData.description: A disease dealing Frost damage every 3 sec and reducing the target's melee and ranged attack speed by 14% for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Blade Barrier
abilitiesData.description: Whenever your Blood Runes are on cooldown, you gain the Blade Barrier effect, which decreases damage taken by 5% for the next 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Pestilence
abilitiesData.description: Causes 65 to 79 Shadow damage to the target and all targets within 10 yards and spreads any diseases on the target to the additional targets.

abilitiesData.name: Death and Decay
abilitiesData.description: Corrupts the ground targeted by the Death Knight, causing 62 Shadow damage every sec that targets remain in the area for 10 sec. This ability produces a high amount of threat.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Boil
abilitiesData.description: Boils the blood of all enemies within 10 yards, dealing 180 to 220 Shadow damage. Deals additional damage to targets infected with Blood Plague or Frost Fever.

abilitiesData.name: Mark of Blood
abilitiesData.description: Place a Mark of Blood on an enemy. Whenever the marked enemy deals damage to a target, that target is healed for 4% of its maximum health. Lasts for 20 sec or up to 20 hits.

abilitiesData.name: Vampiric Blood
abilitiesData.description: Temporarily grants the Death Knight 15% of maximum health and increases the amount of health generated through spells and effects by 35% for 10 sec. After the effect expires, the health is lost.

abilitiesData.name: Icebound Fortitude
abilitiesData.description: The Death Knight freezes their blood to become immune to Stun effects and reduce all damage taken by 30% plus additional damage reduction based on Defense for 12 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Anti-Magic Shell
abilitiesData.description: Surrounds the Death Knight in an Anti-Magic Shell, absorbing 75% of the damage dealt by harmful spells (up to a maximum of 50% of the Death Knight's health) and preventing application of harmful magical effects. Damage absorbed by Anti-Magic Shell energizes the Death Knight with additional runic power. Lasts 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Army of the Dead
abilitiesData.description: Summons an entire legion of Ghouls to fight for the Death Knight. The Ghouls will swarm the area, taunting and fighting anything they can. While channelling Army of the Dead, the Death Knight takes less damage equal to their Dodge plus Parry chance.

abilitiesData.name: Death Pact
abilitiesData.description: Sacrifices an undead minion, healing the Death Knight for 40% of their maximum health. This heal cannot be a critical.

abilitiesData.name: Bloody Strikes
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage of Blood Strike by 15% and Heart Strike by 45%, and increases the damage of Blood Boil by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Spell Deflection
abilitiesData.description: You have a chance equal to your Parry chance of taking 45% less damage from a direct damage spell.

abilitiesData.name: Anticipation R2
abilitiesData.description: Increases your Dodge chance by 2%.

abilitiesData.name: Two-Handed Weapon Specialization
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage you deal with two-handed melee weapons by 4%.

abilitiesData.name: Scent of Blood R2
abilitiesData.description: You have a 15% chance after dodging, parrying or taking direct damage to gain the Scent of Blood effect, causing your next 2 melee hits to generate 10 runic power.

abilitiesData.name: Anticipation
abilitiesData.description: Increases your Dodge chance by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Nerves of Cold Steel
abilitiesData.description: Increases your chance to hit with one-handed melee weapons by 3% and increases the damage done by your offhand weapon by 25%.

abilitiesData.name: Icy Reach
abilitiesData.description: Increases the range of your Icy Touch, Chains of Ice and Howling Blast by 10 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Killing Machine R3
abilitiesData.description: Your melee attacks have a chance to make your next Icy Touch, Howling Blast or Frost Strike a critical strike. Effect occurs more often than Killing Machine (Rank 2).

abilitiesData.name: Raise Dead
abilitiesData.description: Raises a Ghoul to fight by your side. If no humanoid corpse that yields experience or honor is available, you must supply Corpse Dust to complete the spell. You can have a maximum of one Ghoul at a time. Lasts 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Heart Strike
abilitiesData.description: Instantly strike the target and his nearest ally, causing 50% weapon damage plus 198 on the primary target, and 25% weapon damage plus 99 on the secondary target. Each target takes 10% additional damage for each of your diseases active on that target.

abilitiesData.name: Dancing Rune Weapon
abilitiesData.description: Summons a second rune weapon that fights on its own for 12 sec, doing the same attacks as the Death Knight but for 50% reduced damage.

abilitiesData.name: Death Coil
abilitiesData.description: Fire a blast of unholy energy, causing 443 Shadow damage to an enemy target or healing 664.5 damage from a friendly Undead target.

abilitiesData.name: Blood-Caked Blade
abilitiesData.description: Your auto attacks have a 30% chance to cause a Blood-Caked Strike, which hits for 25% weapon damage plus 12.5% for each of your diseases on the target.

abilitiesData.name: Morbidity
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage and healing of Death Coil by 15% and reduces the cooldown on Death and Decay by 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Killing Machine
abilitiesData.description: Your melee attacks have a chance to make your next Icy Touch, Howling Blast or Frost Strike a critical strike. Effect occurs more often than Killing Machine (Rank 4).

abilitiesData.name: Rime
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your Icy Touch and Obliterate by 15% and casting Obliterate has a 15% chance to reset the cooldown on Howling Blast and cause your next Howling Blast to consume no runes.

abilitiesData.name: Unbreakable Armor
abilitiesData.description: Reinforces your armor with a thick coat of ice, increasing your armor by 25% and increasing your Strength by 20% for 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Obliterate
abilitiesData.description: A brutal instant attack that deals 80% weapon damage plus 467, total damage increased 12.5% per each of your diseases on the target, but consumes the diseases.

abilitiesData.name: Frost Strike
abilitiesData.description: Instantly strike the enemy, causing 55% weapon damage plus 138 as Frost damage.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Presence
abilitiesData.description: Strengthens the Death Knight with the presence of blood, increasing damage by 15% and healing the Death Knight by 4% of damage dealt. Only one Presence may be active at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Unholy Presence
abilitiesData.description: Infuses the death knight with unholy fury, increasing attack speed by 15%, movement speed by 15% and reducing the global cooldown on all abilities by 0.5 sec. Only one Presence may be active at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Howling Blast
abilitiesData.description: Blast the target with a frigid wind dealing 518 to 562 Frost damage to all enemies within 10 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Ebon Plaguebringer
abilitiesData.description: Your Crypt Fever morphs into Ebon Plague, which increases magic damage taken by 13% in addition to increasing disease damage taken. Improves your critical strike chance with weapons and spells by 3% at all times.

abilitiesData.name: Scourge Strike
abilitiesData.description: An unholy strike that deals 70% of weapon damage as Physical damage plus 560. In addition, for each of your diseases on your target, you deal an additional 12% of the Physical damage done as Shadow damage.

abilitiesData.name: Summon Gargoyle
abilitiesData.description: A Gargoyle flies into the area and bombards the target with Nature damage modified by the Death Knight's attack power. Persists for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Desolation
abilitiesData.description: Your Blood Strikes cause you to deal 5% additional damage with all attacks for the next 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Bone Shield
abilitiesData.description: The Death Knight is surrounded by 3 whirling bones. While at least 1 bone remains, their takes 20% less damage from all sources and deals 2% more damage with all attacks, spells and abilities. Each damaging attack that lands consumes 1 bone. Lasts 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Unholy Blight
abilitiesData.description: Causes the victims of your Death Coil to be surrounded by a vile swarm of unholy insects, taking 10% of the damage done by the Death Coil over 10 sec, and preventing any diseases on the victim from being dispelled.

abilitiesData.name: Morbidity R1
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage and healing of Death Coil by 5% and reduces the cooldown on Death and Decay by 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Endless Winter
abilitiesData.description: Your strength is increased by 4% and your Mind Freeze no longer costs runic power.

abilitiesData.name: Aspect of the Pack
abilitiesData.description: The hunter and raid members within 40 yards take on the aspects of a pack of cheetahs, increasing movement speed by 30%. If you are struck under the effect of this aspect, you will be dazed for 4 sec. Only one Aspect can be active at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Frost Nova
abilitiesData.description: Blasts enemies near the caster for 365 to 415 Frost damage and freezes them in place for up to 8 sec. Damage caused may interrupt the effect.

abilitiesData.name: Cleansing Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Cleansing Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster that attempts to remove 1 disease and 1 poison effect from party members within 30 yards every 3 seconds. Lasts 5 min.

abilitiesData.name: Mass Dispel
abilitiesData.description: Dispels magic in a 15 yard radius, removing 1 harmful spell from each friendly target and 1 beneficial spell from each enemy target. Affects a maximum of 10 friendly targets and 10 enemy targets. This dispel is potent enough to remove Magic effects that are normally undispellable.

abilitiesData.name: Divine Shield
abilitiesData.description: Protects the paladin from all damage and spells for 12 sec, but reduces all damage you deal by 50%. Once protected, the target cannot be targeted by Divine Shield, Divine Protection, or Hand of Protection again for 2 min. Cannot be used within 30 sec. of using Avenging Wrath.

abilitiesData.name: Ice Block
abilitiesData.description: You become encased in a block of ice, protecting you from all physical attacks and spells for 10 sec, but during that time you cannot attack, move or cast spells. Also causes Hypothermia, preventing you from recasting Ice Block for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Cloak of Shadows
abilitiesData.description: Instantly removes all existing harmful spell effects and increases your chance to resist all spells by 90% for 5 sec. Does not remove effects that prevent you from using Cloak of Shadows.

abilitiesData.name: Mind Control
abilitiesData.description: Controls a humanoid mind up to level 32, but increases the time between its attacks by 25%. Lasts up to 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Earthbind Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons an Earthbind Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 45 sec that slows the movement speed of enemies within 10 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Mind-numbing Poison
abilitiesData.description: Coats a weapon with poison that lasts for 1 hour. Each strike has a 50% chance of poisoning the enemy, increasing their casting time by 30% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Shiv
abilitiesData.description: Performs an instant off-hand weapon attack that automatically applies the poison from your off-hand weapon to the target. Slower weapons require more Energy. Neither Shiv nor the poison it applies can be a critical strike. Awards 1 combo point.

abilitiesData.name: Tranquilizing Shot
abilitiesData.description: Attempts to remove 1 Enrage and 1 Magic effect from an enemy target.

abilitiesData.name: Levitate
abilitiesData.description: Allows the friendly party or raid target to levitate, floating a few feet above the ground. While levitating, the target will fall at a reduced speed and travel over water. Any damage will cancel the effect. Lasts 2 min.

abilitiesData.name: Slow Fall
abilitiesData.description: Slows friendly party or raid target's falling speed for 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Frost Resistance Aura
abilitiesData.description: Gives 130 additional Frost resistance to all party and raid members within 40 yards. Players may only have one Aura on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Frost Resistance Totem
abilitiesData.description: Summons a Frost Resistance Totem with 5 health at the feet of the caster for 5 min. The totem increases party and raid members' frost resistance by 130, if within 30 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Concentration Aura
abilitiesData.description: All party or raid members within 40 yards lose 35% less casting or channeling time when damaged. Players may only have one Aura on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Enhancing Totems
abilitiesData.description: Increases the effect of your Strength of Earth and Flametongue Totems by 15%.

abilitiesData.name: Blessing of Might
abilitiesData.description: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, increasing attack power by 550 for 10 min. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Devotion Aura
abilitiesData.description: Increases the armor bonus of your Devotion Aura by 50% and increases the amount healed on any target affected by any of your Auras by 6%.

abilitiesData.name: Commanding Shout
abilitiesData.description: Increases maximum health of all party and raid members within 30 yards by 2255. Lasts 2 min.

abilitiesData.name: Blessing of Wisdom
abilitiesData.description: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, restoring 92 mana every 5 seconds for 10 min. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Elemental Oath
abilitiesData.description: While Clearcasting from Elemental Focus is active, you deal 10% more spell damage. In addition, party and raid members within 100 yards receive a 5% bonus to their spell critical strike chance.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Power Word: Fortitude
abilitiesData.description: Increases the effect of your Power Word: Fortitude and Prayer of Fortitude spells by 30%, and increases your total Stamina by 4%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Mark of the Wild
abilitiesData.description: Increases the effects of your Mark of the Wild and Gift of the Wild spells by 40%, and increases all of your total attributes by 2%.

abilitiesData.name: Mark of the Wild
abilitiesData.description: Increases the friendly target's armor by 750, all attributes by 37 and all resistances by 54 for 30 min.

abilitiesData.name: Blessing of Kings
abilitiesData.description: Places a Blessing on the friendly target, increasing total stats by 10% for 10 min. Players may only have one Blessing on them per Paladin at any one time.

abilitiesData.name: Sting
abilitiesData.description: Your wasp stings for 64 to 86 Nature damage, and decreases the armor of the target by 5% for 20 sec. While affected, the target cannot stealth or turn invisible.

abilitiesData.name: Curse of Weakness
abilitiesData.description: Target's melee attack power is reduced by 478 and armor is reduced by 5% for 2 min. Only one Curse per Warlock can be active on any one target.

abilitiesData.name: Mangle
abilitiesData.description: Mangle the target, inflicting damage and causing the target to take 30% additional damage from bleed effects for 1 min. This ability can be used in Cat Form or Dire Bear Form.

abilitiesData.name: Lava Breath
abilitiesData.description: Your pet breathes a double gout of molten lava at the target for 128 to 172 Fire damage and reduces the target's casting speed by 25% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Slow
abilitiesData.description: Reduces target's movement speed by 60%, increases the time between ranged attacks by 60% and increases casting time by 30%. Lasts 15 sec. Slow can only affect one target at a time.

abilitiesData.name: Curse of Tongues
abilitiesData.description: Forces the target to speak in Demonic, increasing the casting time of all spells by 30%. Only one Curse per Warlock can be active on any one target. Lasts 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Wound Poison
abilitiesData.description: Each strike has a chance of poisoning the enemy, causing Nature damage and reducing all healing effects used on them by 50% for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Nature's Grasp
abilitiesData.description: While active, any time an enemy strikes the caster they have a 100% chance to become afflicted by Entangling Roots (Rank 8). 3 charges. Lasts 45 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Pain and Suffering
abilitiesData.description: Your Mind Flay has a 100% chance to refresh the duration of your Shadow Word: Pain on the target, and reduces the damage you take from your own Shadow Word: Death by 30%.

abilitiesData.name: Ancestral Knowledge
abilitiesData.description: Increases your Intellect by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Bloodsurge
abilitiesData.description: Your Heroic Strike, Bloodthirst, and Whirlwind hits have a 20% chance of making your next Slam instant for 5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Rune Tap
abilitiesData.description: Converts 1 Blood Rune into 10% of your maximum health.

abilitiesData.name: Subversion
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical strike chance of Blood Strike, Scourge Strike, Heart Strike and Obliterate by 9%, and reduces threat generated while in Blood or Unholy Presence by 25%.

abilitiesData.name: Chill of the Grave
abilitiesData.description: Your Chains of Ice, Howling Blast, Icy Touch and Obliterate generate 5 additional runic power.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Felhunter
abilitiesData.description: Your Felhunter regains 8% of its maximum mana each time it hits with its Shadow Bite ability and the cooldown on that ability is reduced by 4 sec. In addition, increases the effect of your Felhunter's Fel Intelligence by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Vampiric Embrace
abilitiesData.description: Fills you with the embrace of Shadow energy, causing you to be healed for 15% and other party members to be healed for 3% of any single-target Shadow spell damage you deal for 30 min.

abilitiesData.name: Arcane Potency
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical strike chance of your next damaging spell by 30% after gaining Clearcasting or Presence of Mind.

abilitiesData.name: Preparation
abilitiesData.description: When activated, this ability immediately finishes the cooldown on your Evasion, Sprint, Vanish, Cold Blood and Shadowstep abilities.

abilitiesData.name: Enduring Winter R2
abilitiesData.description: Increases the duration of your Summon Water Elemental spell by 10 sec and your Frostbolt spell has a 66% chance to grant up to 10 party or raid members mana regeneration equal to 1% of their maximum mana per 5 sec for 15 sec. This effect cannot occur more often than once every 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Arcane Meditation R2
abilitiesData.description: Allows 33% of your mana regeneration to continue while casting.

abilitiesData.name: Frostbolt
abilitiesData.description: Launches a bolt of frost at the enemy, causing 799 to 861 Frost damage and slowing movement speed by 40% for 9 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Blizzard R2
abilitiesData.description: Adds a chill effect to your Blizzard spell. This effect lowers the target's movement speed by 40%. Lasts 1.5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Ice Barrier
abilitiesData.description: Instantly shields you, absorbing 3300 damage. Lasts 1 min. While the shield holds, spellcasting will not be delayed by damage.

abilitiesData.name: Unbridled Wrath R4
abilitiesData.description: Gives you a chance to generate an additional rage point when you deal melee damage with a weapon. Effect occurs more often than Unbridled Wrath (Rank 3).

abilitiesData.name: Fel Concentration
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the pushback suffered from damaging attacks while casting Drain Life, Drain Mana, Drain Soul, Unstable Affliction, and Haunt spells by 70%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Life Tap
abilitiesData.description: Increases the amount of Mana awarded by your Life Tap spell by 20%.

abilitiesData.name: Amplify Curse
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the global cooldown of your Curses by 0.5 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Bloody Vengeance
abilitiesData.description: Gives you a 3% bonus to physical damage you deal for 30 sec after dealing a critical strike from a weapon swing, spell, or ability. This effect stacks up to 3 times.

abilitiesData.name: Bloodworms
abilitiesData.description: Your weapon hits have a 9% chance to cause the target to spawn 2-4 Bloodworms. Bloodworms attack your enemies, healing you as they do damage for 20 sec or until killed.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Mortal Strike
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage caused by your Mortal Strike ability by 10% and reduces the cooldown by 1 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Mirror Image
abilitiesData.description: Creates 3 copies of the caster nearby, which cast spells and attack the mage's enemies. Lasts 30 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Rend and Tear
abilitiesData.description: Increases damage done by your Maul and Shred attacks on bleeding targets by 20%, and increases the critical strike chance of your Ferocious Bite ability on bleeding targets by 25%.

abilitiesData.name: Master of Elements
abilitiesData.description: Your spell criticals will refund 30% of their base mana cost.

abilitiesData.name: Seal of Light
abilitiesData.description: Fills the Paladin with divine light for 30 min, giving each melee attack a chance to heal the Paladin for (0.15 * Attack power + 0.15 * Holy power). Only one Seal can be active on the Paladin at any one time.
extra: Unleashing this Seal's energy will deal (1 + 0.25 * Holy power + 0.16 * Attack power) Holy damage to an enemy.

abilitiesData.name: Flash of Light
abilitiesData.description: Heals a friendly target for 785 to 879.

abilitiesData.name: Conviction
abilitiesData.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with all spells and attacks by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Earthliving Weapon
abilitiesData.description: Imbue the Shaman's weapon with earthen life. Increases healing done by 110 and each heal has a 20% chance to proc Earthliving on the target, healing an additional 456 over 12 sec. Lasts 30 minutes.

abilitiesData.name: Poleaxe Specialization
abilitiesData.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike and the critical damage caused with Axes and Polearms by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Arcane Torrent
abilitiesData.description: Silence all enemies within 8 yards for 2 sec and restores 6% of your Mana, or 15 Energy, or 15 Runic Power. Non-player victim spellcasting is also interrupted for 3 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Axe Specialization
abilitiesData.description: Expertise with Fist Weapons, Axes and Two-Handed Axes increased by 5.

abilitiesData.name: Berserking
abilitiesData.description: Increases your attack and casting speed by 20% for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Blood Fury
abilitiesData.description: Increases melee attack power by 322 and your damage and healing from spells and effects by up to 163.

abilitiesData.name: Bow Specialization
abilitiesData.description: Your chance to critically hit with Bows is increased by 1%.

abilitiesData.name: Command
abilitiesData.description: Damage dealt by pets increased by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Endurance
abilitiesData.description: Total Health increased by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Expansive Mind
abilitiesData.description: Intellect increased by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Gift of the Naaru
abilitiesData.description: Heals the target for 1235 over 15 sec. The amount healed is increased by your spell power or attack power, whichever is higher.

abilitiesData.name: Gun Specialization
abilitiesData.description: Your chance to critically hit with Guns is increased by 1%.

abilitiesData.name: Heroic Presence
abilitiesData.description: Increases chance to hit with all spells and attacks by 1% for you and all party members within 30 yards.

abilitiesData.name: Mace Specialization-v2
abilitiesData.description: Expertise with Maces and Two-Handed Maces increased by 5.

abilitiesData.name: Mace Specialization-v3
abilitiesData.description: Expertise with Maces and Two-Handed Maces increased by 3.

abilitiesData.name: Quickness
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the chance that melee and ranged attackers will hit you by 2%.

abilitiesData.name: Regeneration
abilitiesData.description: Health regeneration rate increased by 10%. 10% of total Health regeneration may continue during combat.

abilitiesData.name: Sword Specialization
abilitiesData.description: Expertise with Swords and Two-Handed Swords increased by 3.

abilitiesData.name: The Human Spirit
abilitiesData.description: Spirit increased by 3%.

abilitiesData.name: Stoneform
abilitiesData.description: Removes all poison, disease and bleed effects and increases your armor by 10% for 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Ghoul Frenzy
abilitiesData.description: Grants your pet 25% haste for 30 sec and heals it for 60% of its health over the duration.

abilitiesData.name: Dirge
abilitiesData.description: Your Death Strike, Plague Strike and Scourge Strike generate 5 additional runic power.

abilitiesData.name: Epidemic
abilitiesData.description: Increases the duration of Blood Plague and Frost Fever by 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Natural Perfection
abilitiesData.description: Your critical strike chance with all spells is increased by 3% and critical strikes against you give you the Natural Perfection effect reducing all damage taken by 4%. Stacks up to 3 times. Lasts 8 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Scorch
abilitiesData.description: Scorch the enemy for 376 to 444 Fire damage.

abilitiesData.name: Silent Resolve R1
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the threat generated by your Holy and Discipline spells by 7% and reduces the chance your helpful spells and damage over time effects will be dispelled by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Eviscerate
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage done by your Eviscerate ability by 20%.

abilitiesData.name: Thundering Strikes
abilitiesData.description: Improves your chance to get a critical strike with all spells and attacks by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Puncture R1
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the rage cost of your Sunder Armor and Devastate abilities by 1.

abilitiesData.name: Focused Rage
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the rage cost of your offensive abilities by 3.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Disciplines
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the cooldown of your Shield Wall, Retaliation and Recklessness abilities by 60 secs.

abilitiesData.name: Resourcefulness
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the mana cost of all traps, melee abilities and Black Arrow by 60% and reduces the cooldown of all traps and Black Arrow by 6 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Hunting Party R2
abilitiesData.description: Increases your total Agility by an additional 2%, and your Arcane Shot, Explosive Shot and Steady Shot critical strikes have a 66% chance to grant up to 10 party or raid members mana regeneration equal to 1% of the maximum mana per 5 sec. Lasts for 15 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Black Ice R4
abilitiesData.description: Increases your Frost and Shadow damage by 8%.

abilitiesData.name: Unrelenting Storm
abilitiesData.description: Regenerate mana equal to 12% of your Intellect every 5 sec, even while casting.

abilitiesData.name: Judgements of the Pure
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage done by your Seal and Judgement spells by 25%, and your Judgement spells increase your casting and melee haste by 15% for 1 min.

abilitiesData.name: Tidal Force
abilitiesData.description: Increases the critical effect chance of your Healing Wave, Lesser Healing Wave and Chain Heal by 60%. Each critical heal reduces the chance by 20%. Lasts 20 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Cruelty R2
abilitiesData.description: Increases your chance to get a critical strike with melee weapons by 2%.

abilitiesData.name: Seal of Wisdom
abilitiesData.description: Fills the Paladin with divine wisdom for 30 min, giving each melee attack a chance to restore 4% of the paladin's maximum mana. Only one Seal can be active on the Paladin at any one time.
extra: Unleashing this Seal's energy will deal (1 + 0.25 * Holy Power + 0.16 * Attack Power) Holy damage to an enemy.

abilitiesData.name: Dire Bear Form
abilitiesData.description: Shapeshift into dire bear form, increasing melee attack power by 120, armor contribution from cloth and leather items by 370%, and Stamina by 25%. Also protects the caster from Polymorph effects and allows the use of various bear abilities.
extra: The act of shapeshifting frees the caster of Polymorph and Movement Impairing effects.

abilitiesData.name: Improved Moonfire
abilitiesData.description: Increases the damage and critical strike chance of your Moonfire spell by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Moonglow
abilitiesData.description: Reduces the Mana cost of your Moonfire, Starfire, Starfall, Wrath, Healing Touch, Nourish, Regrowth and Rejuvenation spells by 9%.

abilitiesData.name: Berserker Stance
abilitiesData.description: An aggressive stance. Critical hit chance is increased by 3% and all damage taken is increased by 5%.

abilitiesData.name: Shattering Throw
abilitiesData.description: Throws your weapon at the enemy causing 12 + AP *.50 damage (based on attack power), reducing the armor on the target by 20% for 10 sec or removing any invulnerabilities.

abilitiesData.name: Battle Stance
abilitiesData.description: A balanced combat stance that increases the armor penetration of all of your attacks by 10%.

abilitiesData.name: Shadow Word: Death
abilitiesData.description: A word of dark binding that inflicts 750 to 870 Shadow damage to the target. If the target is not killed by Shadow Word: Death, the caster takes damage equal to the damage inflicted upon the target.

abilitiesData.name: Fade
abilitiesData.description: Fade out, temporarily reducing all your threat for 10 sec.

abilitiesData.name: Taunt
abilitiesData.description: Taunts the target to attack you, but has no effect if the target is already attacking you.

secondary_stats.use_1: Allows you to look far into the distance.
